name: MISONR BCS Section 06 Relationships - add Qs 23 and 24 DRAFT
description: OAS0022 v1.0 Report to show BCS Section 6 answers for the selected establishment.

dataset.name: MIS Sentence
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_DIM_LOCATION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK = AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SK (+)) AND ((AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, INITIALS, UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, SURNAME || ', ' || INITIALS AS V_OFFENDER_SURNAME, CASE WHEN MAIN_CHILD_CARER = 0 THEN 'No' ELSE CASE WHEN MAIN_CHILD_CARER = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'Not Answered' END END AS V_S6_MAIN_CHILD_CARER, CASE WHEN LIVE_WITH_OTHERS_O18 = 0 THEN '0' ELSE CASE WHEN LIVE_WITH_OTHERS_O18 = 1 THEN '1' ELSE CASE WHEN LIVE_WITH_OTHERS_O18 = 2 THEN '2' ELSE CASE WHEN LIVE_WITH_OTHERS_O18 = 3 THEN '3' ELSE CASE WHEN LIVE_WITH_OTHERS_O18 = 4 THEN '4' ELSE CASE WHEN LIVE_WITH_OTHERS_O18 = 5 THEN '5' ELSE CASE WHEN LIVE_WITH_OTHERS_O18 = 6 THEN '6' ELSE CASE WHEN LIVE_WITH_OTHERS_O18 = 7 THEN '7' ELSE CASE WHEN LIVE_WITH_OTHERS_O18 = 8 THEN '8' ELSE CASE WHEN LIVE_WITH_OTHERS_O18 = 9 THEN '9' ELSE CASE WHEN LIVE_WITH_OTHERS_O18 = 10 THEN '10' ELSE 'Not answered' END END END END END END END END END END END AS V_S6_LIVE_WITH_HOW_MANY_OTHE38, CASE WHEN SEXUAL_ABUSE_REFERRAL = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_S6_SEXUAL_ABUSE_REFERRAL, CASE WHEN DOMESTIC_VIOLENCE_REFERRAL = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_S6_DOMESTIC_VIOLENCE_REFER31, CASE WHEN CHILD_ABUSE_REFERRAL = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_S6_CHILD_ABUSE_REFERRAL FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: S6 Relationships
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT ASSESSMENT.ASSESSMENT_ID, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION6.CHILD_U18_PARENT_GUARDIAN, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION6.CHILD_U18_MAIN_EQUAL_CARER, ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.BCS_PART1_COMP_DATE, ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.RECEPTION_DATE, BCS_PART_STATUS.DESCRIPTION, OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION6.RELATIONSHIP_STATUS, RELATIONSHIP_STATUS.DESCRIPTION AS RELATIONSHIP_STATUS, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION6.CHILDREN_AT_HOME, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION6.MAIN_CHILD_CARER, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION6.SS_INVOLVED, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION6.LIVE_WITH_OTHERS, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION6.LIVE_WITH_OTHERS_O18, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION6.MAIN_ADULT_CARER, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION6.FAMILY_FRIENDS_CONTACT, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION6.SEXUAL_ABUSE_REFERRAL, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION6.DOMESTIC_VIOLENCE_REFERRAL, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION6.CHILD_ABUSE_REFERRAL, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION6.PROSTITUTION, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION6.S6_ISSUE_TO_BE_ADDRESSED FROM ASSESSMENT, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION6, ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID, BCS_PART_STATUS, OFFENDER, RELATIONSHIP_STATUS, REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY, PURPOSE_OF_BCSREASON WHERE (OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = ASSESSMENT.OFFENDER_ID (+)) AND (OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.OFFENDER_ID (+)) AND (ASSESSMENT.ASSESSMENT_ID = ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.ASSESSMENT_ID AND ASSESSMENT.ASSESSMENT_TYPE_ELM = 'TR_BCS') AND (PURPOSE_OF_BCSREASON.PURPOSE_OF_BCSREASON_CODE (+) = ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.BCS_PURPOSE) AND (ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.ASSESSMENT_ID = ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION6.ASSESSMENT_ID) AND (BCS_PART_STATUS.BCS_PART_STATUS_CODE (+) = ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.BCS_PART1_STATUS) AND (ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION6.RELATIONSHIP_STATUS = RELATIONSHIP_STATUS.RELATIONSHIP_STATUS_CODE (+)) AND (SUBSTR(OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, 1, 10) = TAGMIS_CASELOAD_SECURITY('RQS72F', OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY)) AND (OFFENDER.LIMIT_ACCESS_OFFENDER_INDICAT = 0) AND ((REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.LATEST_OWNERSHIP_RANK = 1) AND BCS_PART_STATUS.DESCRIPTION = 'Complete' AND PURPOSE_OF_BCSREASON.DESCRIPTION IN ('Basic Custody Screening - Start') AND REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.PHYSICAL_LOCATION IN ('Askham Grange (HMP)'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT ASSESSMENT_ID, CHILD_U18_PARENT_GUARDIAN, CHILD_U18_MAIN_EQUAL_CARER, BCS_PART1_COMP_DATE, RECEPTION_DATE, DESCRIPTION, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, RELATIONSHIP_STATUS, RELATIONSHIP_STATUS, CHILDREN_AT_HOME, MAIN_CHILD_CARER, SS_INVOLVED, LIVE_WITH_OTHERS, LIVE_WITH_OTHERS_O18, MAIN_ADULT_CARER, FAMILY_FRIENDS_CONTACT, SEXUAL_ABUSE_REFERRAL, DOMESTIC_VIOLENCE_REFERRAL, CHILD_ABUSE_REFERRAL, PROSTITUTION, S6_ISSUE_TO_BE_ADDRESSED, COUNTDISTINCT(MIS_SENTENCE.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) OVER (PARTITION BY ASSESSMENT_ID = V_MAX_ASSESSMENT_ID) AS V_S6_NOMS_NUMBER, SURNAME || ', ' || INITIALS AS V_OFFENDER_SURNAME, CASE WHEN MAIN_CHILD_CARER = 0 THEN 'No' ELSE CASE WHEN MAIN_CHILD_CARER = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'Not Answered' END END AS V_S6_MAIN_CHILD_CARER, CASE WHEN LIVE_WITH_OTHERS_O18 = 0 THEN '0' ELSE CASE WHEN LIVE_WITH_OTHERS_O18 = 1 THEN '1' ELSE CASE WHEN LIVE_WITH_OTHERS_O18 = 2 THEN '2' ELSE CASE WHEN LIVE_WITH_OTHERS_O18 = 3 THEN '3' ELSE CASE WHEN LIVE_WITH_OTHERS_O18 = 4 THEN '4' ELSE CASE WHEN LIVE_WITH_OTHERS_O18 = 5 THEN '5' ELSE CASE WHEN LIVE_WITH_OTHERS_O18 = 6 THEN '6' ELSE CASE WHEN LIVE_WITH_OTHERS_O18 = 7 THEN '7' ELSE CASE WHEN LIVE_WITH_OTHERS_O18 = 8 THEN '8' ELSE CASE WHEN LIVE_WITH_OTHERS_O18 = 9 THEN '9' ELSE CASE WHEN LIVE_WITH_OTHERS_O18 = 10 THEN '10' ELSE 'Not answered' END END END END END END END END END END END AS V_S6_LIVE_WITH_HOW_MANY_OTHE38, CASE WHEN SEXUAL_ABUSE_REFERRAL = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_S6_SEXUAL_ABUSE_REFERRAL, CASE WHEN DOMESTIC_VIOLENCE_REFERRAL = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_S6_DOMESTIC_VIOLENCE_REFER31, CASE WHEN CHILD_ABUSE_REFERRAL = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS V_S6_CHILD_ABUSE_REFERRAL FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: LIVE_WITH_OTHERS_O18
field.display: Live With How Many Others Over 18

field.name: $ref:V_S6_NOMS_NUMBER
field.display: B6.24 How many children under the age of 18, living at home, are you the main or equal carer for?
field.legacySql: =Count([MIS Sentence].[NOMS Number];Distinct) Where ([Assessment ID] = [v_Max Assessment ID])

field.name: $ref:V_S6_NOMS_NUMBER
field.legacySql: =Count([MIS Sentence].[NOMS Number];Distinct) Where ([Assessment ID] = [v_Max Assessment ID])

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE V_MAX_ASSESSMENT_ID_FOR_FILTER IN (1))

field.name: $ref:V_OFFENDER_SURNAME
field.display: B6.1 Are you in a relationship, or single?

field.name: $ref:V_S6_MAIN_CHILD_CARER
field.display: B6.7 Are social services involved with your family?

field.name: $ref:V_S6_SOCIAL_SERVICES_INVOLVED
field.display: B6.9 Do you live with others?

field.name: $ref:V_S6_LIVE_WITH_OTHERS
field.display: B6.11 How many people over 18 live with you? - This field is only available if the answer to question B6.9 is Yes

field.name: $ref:V_S6_LIVE_WITH_HOW_MANY_OTHE38
field.display: B6.14 Are you the main carer for any adults?
field.legacySql: =If([Live With How Many Others Over 18]=0;"0";(If([Live With How Many Others Over 18]=1;"1";(If([Live With How Many Others Over 18]=2;"2";(If([Live With How Many Others Over 18]=3;"3";(If([Live With How Many Others Over 18]=4;"4";(If([Live With How Many Others Over 18]=5;"5";(If([Live With How Many Others Over 18]=6;"6";(If([Live With How Many Others Over 18]=7;"7";(If([Live With How Many Others Over 18]=8;"8";(If([Live With How Many Others Over 18]=9;"9";(If([Live With How Many Others Over 18]=10;"10";"Not answered")))))))))))))))))))))

field.name: $ref:V_S6_MAIN_ADULT_CARER
field.display: B6.16 Are you in contact with any family and friends?

field.name: $ref:V_S6_FAMILY_FRIENDS_CONTACT
field.display: B6.17 Would you like to be referred to someone who can help with sexual abuse issues?

field.name: $ref:V_S6_SEXUAL_ABUSE_REFERRAL
field.display: B6.18 Would you like to be referred to someone who can help with domestic violence issues?

field.name: $ref:V_S6_DOMESTIC_VIOLENCE_REFER31
field.display: B6.19 Would you like to be referred to someone who can help with childhood abuse issues?

field.name: $ref:V_S6_CHILD_ABUSE_REFERRAL
field.display: B6.20 Have you ever been involved in prostitution?

field.name: $ref:V_S6_PROSTITUTION
field.display:
B6.21 Is Relationships an issue which needs addressing? 
[For the screener to consider]

field.name: $ref:V_S6_ISSUE_TO_BE_ADDRESSED
field.display: B6.23 How many children under the age of 18 are you a parent or guardian for?
field.legacySql: =If([S6 Issue To Be Addressed]=0;"No";(If([S6 Issue To Be Addressed]=1;"Yes";"Don't Know")))
